name.baseName: Emulsion powder ; Raw cow's milk ; Milk collection + cold storage + clean milk + homogenization + blending + homogenization + sterilization concentration + spray drying + packaging ; All sizes; NESPS2
乳粉 ; 生鲜牛乳 ; 收奶—冷贮+净乳+均质+配料+均质+杀菌浓缩+喷雾干燥+包装 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97.79

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97.79
technology.technologicalApplicability: 乳化粉生产过程包括收集生鲜牛乳，接着进行一系列处理，包括冷贮、清洁、均质化、混配、再次均质化、杀菌浓缩、喷雾干燥和包装。该过程适用于不同规模的乳化粉生产。为控制污染，采用了末端处理技术对此过程产生的废水进行处理。具体处理的污染物包括化学需氧量(COD)、氨氮和有机结合态氮，使用厌氧和好氧生物处理结合方法以达到高效去除污染物的效果。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码14,四级代码1442文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为乳粉，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为废水排放量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标废水排放量的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水排放量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为废水排放量
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management89.2
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为89.2，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氨氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen, organic boundisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85.5
污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为85.5，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为总氮

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97.79
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为97.79，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水处理设施耗电量（千瓦时/年）/(总额定功率(千瓦)×年运行时间(小时))。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为化学需氧量
